Articles.Content:
Hi,

Did you ever wanted to put some SAS, or RCS fuel, but Your rocket had too thick parts?

Not anymore!

[TABLE=class: grid, width: 500, align: center]

[TR]

[TD]Number[/TD]

[TD]Description[/TD]

[/TR]

[TR]

[TD]1 - Aerodynamic nose cone[/TD]

[TD]It's just Aerodynamic part for use in biggest rockets[/TD]

[/TR]

[TR]

[TD]2 - Very big SAS unit[/TD]

[TD]Torque = 80[/TD]

[/TR]

[TR]

[TD]3 - Very big RCS tank[/TD]

[TD]Carries 5000 units of Monopropellant[/TD]

[/TR]

[/TABLE]

Do You have idea for another part?

Post it.

DOWNLOAD AND LICENCES

DOWNLOAD[1.0]

I like the idea! I won't pretend that the textures aren't pretty bad right now, but I imagine you don't intend those to be final. If you can get the textures to be more inline with the current 3M parts, it'd be a good mod! Also, though, I don't know if the monopropellant tank ought to look like that; it's so bumpy it looks kinda bad next to the very smooth large parts.
Since it use stock texture ,I will use tweak scale instead.
hmm i see you're making a lot of mods lately its a good thing trust me , but you make them so quicke the textures are really bad its just not "good" quality sorry , any way keep up the good works :3

Thanks,

i just don't have "Talent" to make textures. It's too hard for me, i don't know how to make them good, beautiful etc. but i'll try.
I'm sure there are plenty of tutorials for that sort of thing online. It's just a matter of taking the time to learn it.
Yeah, either learn online or hire someone, then I'm certain you will get lots of dls- these are great concepts.

What do You think? It's almost better than first one. I'll try to improve it.

(It's my second try with textures like this, first one can be seen THERE)
It's a vast improvement over the original textures.
